name: Nhà Nghỉ Thu Nụ
address: Hạnh Phúc, Mèo Vạc, Việt Nam
description:
Nhìn ra núi, Nhà Nghỉ Thu Nụ ở Mèo Vạc cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có khu vườn, phòng chờ chung, sân hiên và quầy bar. Nhà nghỉ B&B có WiFi và chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí.

Nhà Nghỉ Thu Nụ có TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí, máy sấy tóc và vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh.

Chỗ nghỉ có dịch vụ cho thuê xe đạp.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Wenshan Puzhehei, cách Nhà Nghỉ Thu Nụ 188 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Good location. Good price. The owners greeted us every time they saw us. They did their best to keep everything clean. The parking was very convenient.
review.comment_negative: Roaches, begrudgingly gave us clean towels and toilet paper, very loud at times, other people tried to come into our room. It was a private room, not a dorm. No one should be trying to come in.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive:
- friendly/nice women
- nice, clean room with big window
review.comment_negative: - nothing

review.comment_positive: Bed was comfy, shower hot and location great. The family who runs the place was very nice. Ok place for a one night stay during the loop.
review.comment_negative: The room wasn't the cleanest, there was cigarette ash on the bedside table and you could smell the cigarettes. Heating didn't work and we only had one proper blanket for the night, which wasn't the most comfortable in Meo Vac temperatures.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Esta bien ubicado. Los dueños son muy simpaticos y te ayudan en lo que necesites!
review.comment_negative: En cuanto a la vista, si bien se ven las montañas, pero detrás de los edificios y carteles del pueblo!

review.rating: Kind hospitality and certainly feels very welcome after long hours on the road.
review.comment_positive: The location was good as it was just in front of the market. Safety of our bikes were assured as they were all parked inside the hotel garage and locked. The host was very kind and pleasant eventhough we have to use Google translate to communicate.
review.comment_negative: If you are travelling there during the cold season, there is no heater in the room. Also, I think the water heater were shut off after certain hours where there is no hot water for shower after later part at night and morning. It can be a bit noisy at night as there could be some karaoke outlets or local pubs nearby. Besides, no soundproofing especially when the occupants from the adjacent room are using the bathroom/toilet.

review.comment_positive: cô chủ vui vẻ nhiệt tình

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ, view đẹp, vị trí thuận tiện
review.comment_negative: Cách âm kém

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Dịch vụ ở mức chấp nhận được, phòng hơi nhỏ.
주인 아주머니가 아주 친절하였고, 특히 밤 10시가 넘어 도착했는데 늦었다며 라면을 끓여주시고 맥주까지 무료로 주셨음
review.comment_negative: 시설이 조금 낡음

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: Great room and facilities
review.comment_negative: Couldn't get the shower warm even after talking to the staff. This was a bit brutal after riding through the cold mountains

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Location, comfortable bed.
review.comment_negative: Nothing

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: I had the best sleep during my ha giang loop ride here
The host was friendly and welcoming. He let us have 3 bottles of water and allow us to refill our bottle too. The room is in the town center and has a really nice view to the outside!

Un grand merci pour la gentillesse de la dame. Chambre propre et spacieuse.
Très reposant après une journée à moto

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: Lovely lady that owns the place! Clean and fresh for what you pay for. You can park your bike inside during the night!
review.comment_negative: Nothing much to complain about except that it’s really easy to hear your neighbors in the bathroom.

review.rating: would stay again if we were desperate.
review.comment_positive: The welcome was warm and friendly. bicycle storage was good. Location was central.wifi worked ok.hot water for a shower.
review.comment_negative:
As is common in cheaper hotels, the beds were very hard, It is difficult to complain too much when you think about the price you pay but as we are cycling we are staying in more accommodation  than most and have stayed in better for cheaper.
there were holes in the adjoining walls which meant the next door guests smoke came in to our rooms, the windows did not close so we could hear arguments on the street and someone throwing up. 
we could only sit on the loo sideways as it was so close to the wall.

review.comment_positive: A very kind and sweet lady, she will do anything to help you out,for free.
review.comment_negative: No breakfast

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: The hosts were really sweet. The room is clean and we had everything we needed.
review.comment_negative: The bed was a bit hard and there was not hot water when I showered.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Posizione ok e host spaticissima. Rapporto qualità prezzo buono
review.comment_negative:
Stanza con una vetrata enorme ma non apribile...la finestra apribile è 20x30cm.
Climatizzatore c'è ma non fa freddo, bagno veramente brutto.

review.comment_positive: Dịch vụ ở mức khá, nhân viên cũng lịch sự.

review.rating: Pas cher mais pas très propre.

Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Phòng ấm áp, sạch sẽ và thơm.
Vị trí ngay gần chợ Mèo Vạc rất phù hợp cho các bạn muốn trải nghiệm chợ phiên. 

Cô Bác chủ nhà rất thân thiện, hiếu khách và chu đáo.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: Lady at reception very nice. Good central location. Good price.
review.comment_negative:
First room shown no window. Unacceptable, but lady fixed us up with a room with a window.
Bathroom needed cleaning.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Die Besitzerin ist sehr nett, wir durften unser Motorrad in ihre Garage stellen und bekamen Tee zur Begrüßung. 
Eigentlich hatten wir unser Zimmer im ersten Stock, doch sie hat uns das Zimmer im dritten Stock angeboten, da dieses ein riesiges Fenster mit Aussicht auf die Berge hat. 
Die Unterkunft liegt sehr zentral, trotzdem ruhig.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Отель очень понравился, особенно шикарный вид из панорамного окна на горы, владельцы отеля очень приветливые, комната чистая, уютная.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: My wife and I had such a great stay. The woman who owns and runs it is fantastic. She treated us very well, took pictures with us, had tea waiting for us on arrival, everything we could have asked for. The room was great! It was overlooking one of the streets of Meo Vac, had a nice comfy bed and even some mood lighting! Hot water and a heater that worked so well! It’s December and got quite cold in the north so that alone was priceless. Excellent stay, 100% recommend.
ubicación  cerca de restaurantes, local Market
review.comment_negative: la cama es una piedra

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Location was in the center next to the market. Friendly staff, room was clean. Good value for the price.
review.comment_negative: Make sure the water is hot before shower. Otherwise the water is super cold.

review.comment_positive: This place was absolutely immaculate and a credit to its owner! A fantastic room with a massive big window looking out at the mountains. Couldn't ask for more. Well positioned too for food and drink and also the night market. There's a nice walk too that leads to a few bars past the mountains. Locals are really friendly.
review.comment_negative: I cannot think of anything!

review.rating: Good place centrally located in Meo Vac
review.comment_positive: Centrally located in downtown Meo Vac, decent place

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: The property was clean and had good location
review.comment_negative:
We stopped there to rest from the day’s driving, but it was not very quiet. The staff were very loud with each other during the night but also in the early morning with really loud music.
We didn’t appreciate since we stopped to rest

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn khá ổn, phù hợp với gia đình có con nhỏ.
The hotel Is already ok, equal to its price. Not bad location with parking fór bikes a laundry service.
review.comment_negative: The staff or owner (older woman) Is not speaking aby single  word english.  Is problem to talk about anything. Also she is not respecting privacy on room. She came in our room 3 times without invitatiton. It was really not good feeling, when you are weared only on underwears.... Maybe it is the different culture missunderstanding, but when you are working with Booking, then you can expect foreingers in your hotel and think about, if your custom will be acceped and welcome by your guests.

review.comment_positive: Near new building, Central location . Spotlessly clean. Helpful managers..
review.comment_negative: There was nothing to dislike..

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Gutes Zimmer. Sauber, gute Lage, ausgestattet mit allem was man für eine Nacht braucht. Haben zur Begrüßung Tee und Wasser bekommen. Die Klimaanlage hat auch geheizt, es war also nachts nicht kalt :)

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Không gian khá yên tĩnh, phòng sạch sẽ.

Der Empfang war sehr herzlich und der Gastgeber sehr freudlich. Wir haben das Zimmer nur für Übernachtung genutzt und wenig Zeit dort verbracht. Generell hat es uns aber an nichts gemangelt. Die Betten waren vernünftig, das Bad sauber. Wir würden es noch mal buchen.
review.comment_negative: Nichts zu bemängeln.

review.comment_positive: Prix modique (6€/pers)
review.comment_negative:
Localisation trop approximative : on a mis une heure à trouver..
Veillez à ce que les draps soient propres.
Salle d eau a rénover (fuites d' eau).

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Khá ổn cho một kỳ nghỉ gia đình. Nhân viên cũng được.

review.rating: *HABITACIÓN SIN VENTANA evidentemente sin vistas a la montaña*
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_negative:
No tenía vistas a la montaña porque no tiene ventana  al exterior. Es un engaño, solo hay una habitación como la de la foto, el resto tienen una ventanita con reja que da al pasillo o escalera.
Se oye todo de los pasillos, escalera, habitaciones y baños vecinos.
Ni siquiera obtuve disculpas de la dueña ante mi queja por vender habitaciones con vistas a la montaña imposibles.
Sabana bajera con volante en zona de la cabeza y tejido horrible.

review.comment_positive: Everything worked, even the TV (not as common as you'd think). Staff were very friendly and helpful. Ha Giang is small so everything is nearby but you've got a large convenience store across the street and down the block the area market can be found which has a little bit of everything. Wifi was fast and dependable. Very good value if you need to spend a night in Meo Vac.
review.comment_negative: They didn't clean under the toilet seat in a while. Its a bit loud. The room doors and locks make a lot of noise. My neighbors bathroom and mine might as well have been one room based on the sound, poor guy had a bout of travellers diarrhea and I basically heard every, little, detail.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Tôi hài lòng với sự sạch sẽ của phòng.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Über das Zimmer kann ich nichts sagen aber der Service ist sehr freundlich. Wir mussten das Zimmer kurzfristig absagen und die Besitzer sind uns sehr entgegengekommen und waren freundlich.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Ok
Host was friendly, offered tea and plums when we arrived. Pretty typical hotel in a small town.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_negative: We were really screwed here. We had booked a room with a mountain view, but were tucked away in a room with a view of a wall with a painting of mountains on it. There were bars on the window that looked out on the staircase of the hotel and half of the window was broken, so it couldn’t close. The woman was smoking downstairs in the lobby, so we were in the smoke smell all night. In addition, the bed was a plank with a piece of foam on it, and the woman also tried to screw us upon arrival with our booking via BOOKING.com. She asked us if we could cancel the booking via booking.com, so that she did not have to pay money to booking.com. She knew that we would have to pay a fee if we canceled so late, but it would be debited the next day. So we got a different (and worse) room then we booked. She tried to sell the room as an upgrade to us and not charging us more. She tried to make us cancel the booking while we already paid. And the conditions of the room were horrible.

review.rating: Lawaaiige kamer met slechte bedden en erg kleine badkamer
review.comment_positive: De eigenaresse was erg vriendelijk
review.comment_negative: Hele slechte bedden, erg veel lawaai, de badkamer was zo klein dat het toilet er scheef in moest. Bij booking stond dit guesthouse met een cijfer 8. Ik begin nu te twijfelen aan de reviews. Dit leek echt nergens op.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Bữa sáng tạm ổn, không quá đa dạng nhưng ăn được.
The host is so sweet, even though she didn't speak english she really tried her best. The room has a nice light.
review.comment_negative: The cleaning on the bathroom could be much better

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Tạm được, phòng giống như mô tả.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Nhân viên thân thiện, phòng ở mức chấp nhận được.

review.comment_positive: Tôi hài lòng với dịch vụ ở đây, nhân viên cũng nhanh nhẹn.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

Abstellmöglichkeit für unser Motorrad

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: La dueña es amable. Tienen parking cerrado gratuito para dejar la moto.
review.comment_negative: El colchón de la cama es duro y el edredón estaba un poco sucio.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
Cô chủ dễ thương, nhiệt tình.   Phòng sạch sẽ,máy nước nóng, máy sấy tóc, ấm siêu tốc, lạnh quá mình không sử dụng máy lạnh.  ngay chợ . Có nhiều quán ăn ngon xung quanh. Đầy đủ tiện ích. Chỉ cách  sông nho quế 12km. Khách sạn thích nhất trong kì nghỉ của mình.  Mình 
Cho 5 sao nha!!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: For a budget guesthouse it was pretty clean and comfortable. The staff was kind and attentive. Excellent value for money

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

review.rating: overall good stay, but would choose a homestay next time
review.comment_positive: Very kind staff
review.comment_negative: Room with no windows, mosquitoes and very intense fluorescent lighting

review.rating: You do not get what you pay for. Careful here
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_negative: Booked a room with Mountain View, but got a view with now outside window.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Trải nghiệm khá tốt, vị trí cũng dễ tìm.

review.rating: Great place to stay in Meo Vac. Clean rooms, good amenities, and great hosts
review.comment_positive: The hosts are great people. Very welcoming and caring. The room was immaculately clean as was the washroom. It is well located near food and the night market. I definitely recommend this stay to anyone visiting Meo Vac.

Nothing about the hotel that I like.
But there is a nice coffee shop nearby with great coffee and banh mi- La Coffee
review.comment_negative: Terrible experience. "Mountain view" rooms were a joke – one flooded, no window in the other.  Misleading photos and they make you pay before you see the room.

review.rating: esta bien para estar una noche de paso.
review.comment_positive: las vistas, el parking y el personal.
review.comment_negative: no funcionaba el agua caliente ni el aire acondicionado, la cama era una tabla de madera muy dura.

review.comment_positive: The owner is super kind and friendly. Nice location.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Tout était parfait, l’hôte était adorable et nous a énormément aidé
Mình đi 6 người thuê 1 phòng, giá rẻ nhưng phòng thì rộng, sạch sẽ, thoáng. Cô chủ nhiệt tình, gần khu ăn uống, hội trường, chợ, từ chỗ nghỉ đi đến khi Pả Vi vài Km đi chơi buổi tối cũng rất tuyệt

Location was ok 
Safe place to park motorcycles
Hot water in the shower
Available AC and heaters in some rooms
review.comment_negative:
Rooms were very noisy and didn't have windows
There are holes in the walls between rooms allowing in light and noise from other guests
Beds were extremely hard and uncomfortable 
Staff didn't speak English
Other guests were listening to loud music 
Place wasn't very clean

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

The woman who is at the reception was soooo nice!!! She doesn't speak English but still manage to understand us . I was so cold she get us another big cover . 
The room was clean and comfortable .
review.comment_negative: However we could hear the people next door (they were making a lot of noise

review.comment_positive: cô chủ rất thân thiện, nhiệt tình, lần sau nếu lên sẽ qua tiếp

review.comment_positive: The room was very clean and spacious. We loved the good view! Also the owner was very sweet. Great Stay :)
Tuyệt vời
review.comment_negative: Không có

review.comment_positive:
They welcomed us with tea and turned on the heater so we could warm up after a long drive.
The room is clean and there's hot water.
It's simple but perfect.

review.rating: A comfortable overnight stay which left us well rested to continue our journey.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: The room was very simple but pleasant. The greeting and continued interactions with the owner were sweet and friendly. It’s location was terrific and the private parking was secure. The air conditioning was greatly appreciated.
review.comment_negative: There wasn’t a fridge in the room but the owners put our things in their fridge for us. The bathroom was a little odd with the water from the neighbours shower coming into our bathroom and around my feet while I was sitting on the toilet. I find the lack of sheets on the bed confusing in North Vietnam. It seems like a lot to wash in between each guest. I wished I’d bought a sheet with me.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Khá ổn cho một chuyến đi gia đình. Giá cả hợp lý.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Tạm được, phù hợp cho nhóm bạn không yêu cầu cao.
Phòng nghỉ giường rộng thoải mái, nhà mình 4 người chọn phòng 3 giường, có 2 giường đôi và 1 đơn, nệm êm dày. Chủ nhà nhiệt tình hỗ trợ.
thân thiện
review.comment_negative: cách âm chưa tốt

review.comment_positive: Big room. Friendly owners. Water and tea on arrival. Great view. Very clean. Considering the price it was the best around by far. At least on Booking.com.
review.comment_negative: Nothing we didn't like.

review.comment_positive: vị trí ngay tại cổng chợ Mèo Vạc rất thuận tiện cho ăn uống và tham quan chợ phiên. Cô chú chủ nhiệt tình và thân thiện vô cùng, sẽ quay trở lại nếu có dịp ghé Mèo Vạc

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Phòng tắm có nước nóng đầy đủ, khá ổn.
Comfortable clean and spacious room in a good location. Friendly staff. Lots of hooks around the room to hang up clothes.
review.comment_negative: Wifi was a little spotty at times, and sometimes certain appliances would short circuit something, so the water heater didn’t work for a short while. However the staff were very helpful and would promptly come to fix things.

review.comment_positive: Rien .
review.comment_negative: Personnel très désagréable, beaucoup trop bruyant le jour  avec des travaux et le soir avec la rue  car très mal isolé. Propreté à revoir.

review.rating: très bon arrêt sur la boucle d’ha giang
review.comment_positive: la gentillesse de la propriétaire avec qui on a échangé par traducteur interposée. Elle nous a offert le thé pour qu’on se réchauffe à notre arrivée. On a pu choisir notre chambre. C’est bien situé pour aller manger en ville.
review.comment_negative: rien

review.rating: This was a very nice place to stay
review.comment_positive: It was a good location with a clean & comfortable bed that had decent Wi-Fi and hot water.
review.comment_negative: There is a fair amount of noise but not unusual for the region. Roosters crowing and dogs barking are to be expected

review.rating: mình nghỉ tạm 1 đêm nên cũng chấp nhận dc vì cô chủ rất thân thiện

review.comment_negative: nhà nghỉ đã xây lâu nên hơi cũ, ko có thang máy nên phải vác hàng lý thang bộ khá bất tiện

schlechtestes Hotel was wir in Vietnam hatten. 
-Spinne war im Bad die so groß war wie eine Handfläche. das Bad hat Durchbrüche in der Fassade wegen den Leitungen nach draußen.Deshalb ist das kein Wunder.
-Zimmer war sehr dreckig. schlecht geputzt. unter dem Bett waren viele Verpackungen und Staub. 
-kein Fenster, nur ein Loch über der Tür der zum Flur zeigt. Deshalb war es sehr hellhörig.

Fazit: für eine Nacht war das in Ordnung. wegen des Ha Giang Loops hat man sowieso nicht viel Auswahl. aber eindeutig zu überteuert. in anderen Teilen Vietnams hatten wir jedes Mal für den gleichen Preis viel bessere Unterkünfte in viel besserem Zustand und besserer Sauberkeit.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Clean
review.comment_negative: Talkative housekeeper, i checked in late and she was suspective if i came or not. i’m too tired to hear her rambling and complaining about our late check-in but she wouldn’t leave us alone. Ask me to cancel on BK to receive the full amount. Won’t come back

review.comment_positive: Die Unterkunft hat eine gute Lage. Das Zimmer ist sehr geräumig und hat eine große Glasfront. Für eine Nacht ist es in Ordnung.
review.comment_negative: Das Bad war leider sehr dreckig und die Bettwäsche hat sehr chemisch gerochen, wie als hätte man sie mit Chemie gewaschen. Die Bettdecke hatte auch Flecken und Haare lagen auch verteilt.

review.comment_positive: Cô chủ rất nhiệt tình, vị trí đẹp

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_negative: Die Bettwäsche war komplett aus Plastik. Das Zimmer war wirklich sehr hellhörig! Das Bad und die Sauberkeit waren auch für asiatische Verhältnisse eher im unteren Durchschnitt. Mit den guten Rezensionen war ich doch ziemlich enttäuscht. Die Besitzerin war sehr nett, dennoch würde ich hier nicht nochmal übernachten.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

review.rating: Wouldn’t waste my money or time, stay in a home stay if you need something cheaper, they are friendlier and cleaner.
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Location was ok
review.comment_negative: Bed was awful. Staff were rude, we asked for help with the WiFi, as the password provided wasn’t working, they literally just spoke to us like like we were stupid and repeated what they had already given us (which wasn’t working). We also asked for some help with our bike, just to ask where we would buy the luggage ties from, they just ignored us. Towels were dirty, like actually wet from previous use. And only 1 was provided. Room was dirty and stunk of fags.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: Gute Unterkunft. Das Zimmer war etwa kühl, weil das Fenster nicht komplett schliessbar war, aber sehr sauber.
cô chú chủ nhà nhiệt tình, chu đáo. Nhà nghỉ gần chợ đêm Mèo Vạc thuận tiện di chuyển. Phòng đầy đủ tiện nghi, sạch sẽ, ấm cúng. Lần sau nhất định sẽ ghé tiếp

review.comment_positive: Die Lage ist sehr gut. Markt und zahlreiche Geschäfte direkt vor der Haustüre. Trotzdem Nachts sehr ruhig .

Sauberkeit allgemein.

review.rating: welcoming and comfortable in a great location. highly recommend for a stay whilst biking the Loop
review.comment_positive: hot shower, heated room and comfortable bed with a view of Meo Vac city. Awesome! The lady who works here doesn’t speak English but is super accomodating and welcoming. Meo Vac is a much better place to stay than Dong Van
review.comment_negative: can’t complain about anything!

review.rating: Clean and comfortable homestay with friendly hosts
review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Clean and quite comfortable, but water pressure on the third floor was a bit weak. Shower was hot though and hosts were super kind and friendly. Definitely a great place to stay for the night and rest.
review.comment_negative: Bed was a bit hard and blanket was quite small for 2 people.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Great location in town. The woman running the hotel does her best and is super friendly. She made the check in process easy and the room, while pretty simple and basic, was comfortable. The wifi was perfect. She even had a place to park my motorcycle inside the house. Overall a great place to spend a night in Meo Vac. For the price, you can't go wrong.

review.comment_positive:
Le rapport qualité prix
La gentillesse des propriétaires
Spacious room in central location of Meco Vac. The property offers inside car / motorbike parking, which is very nice. It does the job for a one night stay on the loop and the staff is very friendly.
review.comment_negative: cleanliness should be improved in the bedroom and the bathroom. Also, there was a hole in the wall connecting the room to the corridor - it didn’t impact our stay much but was a little bit inconvenient. The bed is very hard, but that is common here in Vietnam.

review.comment_positive: Die Unterkunft ist gut gelegen und wir konnten unseren Roller in der Garage der Besitzerin abstellen.
review.comment_negative:
- Der Check-in lief nicht gut ab. Die Besitzerin hat uns zwar erst herzlich begrüßt als wir angekommen sind, aber als wir einchecken wollten, hat sie die ganze Zeit nebenbei telefoniert. Auch als sie uns das Zimmer gezeigt hat. Das empfanden wir als sehr unhöflich. 
- Das Zimmer war sehr dreckig. Uns ist bewusst, dass man für diesen Preis keinen Luxus erwarten kann, aber einigermaßen sauber sollte es schon sein. Es waren überall schwarze Haare und das Badezimmer war so dreckig, dass wir dort nicht mit Socken, sondern nur mit Schuhe. reingegangen sind. 
- Es war sehr laut und hellhörig.

review.comment_negative:
La cama era exageradamente dura. Un colchón de tres dedos. 
La habitación no tenía ventana y el baño estaba comunicado con el de la habitación contigua. Se escucha absolutamente todo.

review.rating: Good location. The host doesn’t speak any English but was helpful enough. Bed was a little firm but that’s like most pla
review.comment_positive: Good location in Meo Vac.
review.comment_negative: Hot water in the shower only lasted for 5 mins - which was more notable after a cold part of the loop

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: L’Emplacement
review.comment_negative:
Le propriétaire n’est pas honnête. Nous avions réservé une chambre avec un lit double et une grande fenêtre avec une vue sur la montagne, il nous a d’abord fait payé pour cette chambre avant de nous installer dans une chambre avec 2 lit simples, une petite fenêtre haute munie de barreaux donnant sur l’escalier toujours allumé… 
Il ne voulait rien entendre, ils avait donné notre chambre à quelqu’un d’autre…

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: 8 euros la nuit pour 2 avec chauffage
Gần trung tâm
review.comment_negative: Phòng cách âm kém, k có cửa sổ, hơi bí

review.comment_positive: Personal foarte dragut, dispus sa ajute.
review.comment_negative: Zgomot foarte mare, gălăgie.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Friendly owner, welcoming you with tea. Clean spacious room. Comfortable bed, pillow and duvet. Parking in garage possible.
review.comment_negative:
Didn't get the booked room with window, because customer overstayed due to illness.
Room only had small window (with opal glass, no curtains) to stairwell. Quite loud and light in the stairwell going on/off was annoying.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: Nhà nghị ngay chợ Mèo Vạc, gần khu Pả Vi, đi chơi rất tiện. Bác chủ nhà nghỉ thân thiện dễ mến. Giá còn rất rẻ nữa. Iu con người Hà Giang lắm mng ơiii😍

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: Cô chủ vui vẻ thân thiện lắm. Được cô cho chọn phòng view đẹp luôn. Lần sau đi Mèo Vạc sẽ quay lại
review.comment_negative: Không có

review.comment_positive: Amazing lady at the reception. Even though she spoke no English, she invited us for tea and gave us fruit and we spent a very nice time together. The room was clean and spacious, towels were included and they had a plce to leave the motorbike.
review.comment_negative: The bed was a bit too hard and the price I considered to be high for the zone (compared to other places on the Ha Giang loop).

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Really nice room with a big window looking out on the mountains.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: View nhìn ra thị trấn, chợ Mèo Vạc rất đẹp!!!
review.comment_negative: Hoạt động của điều hòa không ổn định lắm

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Beautiful views from the room and we were given a nice welcome after a long day's drive. The bedroom was quiet at nighttime and relatively comfortable.
review.comment_negative: We didn't have a blanket when we first arrived but upon request the manager brought us blankets and extra pillows so the problem was solved.

review.rating: Kỳ nghỉ thoải mái, nhà nghỉ tốt
review.comment_positive: Chủ nhà thân thiện
review.comment_negative: không

review.comment_positive:
nhà nghỉ đối diện chợ đêm Mèo Vạc, tiện để thăm thú
chỗ ở sạch sẽ đủ điều hoà nóng lạnh máy sấy

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi

review.comment_positive: Für eine Nacht auf der Durchreise gut. Freundliche Betreiber!
review.comment_negative: Nicht sehr sauber, hat etwas nach Zigarettenrauch gerochen.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: airconditioning was honestly the only positive thing about our stay!!! :(
review.comment_negative:
we arrived and the hostess wanted to give us another room which we denied. Then she came back and wanted to show us a room with windows, which our room didnt have(on booking.com it did). She tried to charge us more money for the room with windows, when we said no we could get the room anyway with no extra charge which was kind of weird to us… She was kind of agressive when speaking to us.

When we finally setteled we immediately saw a dead cockroach in the room(very disgusting!!) 🤮. On top there was a hole connecting our room to the corridor which gave us a lot of light and noice at night. There was a LOT of very loud screaming till late at night. Our neighbours were scraping their throats and spitting all night and we could hear every detail of it. 
It was a horrible night…!!!

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Vị trí tốt, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, dịch vụ cũng ổn.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Le personnel très gentil
